title: Can't find Use VM ID property?
author: jcandresen
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Be able to set use VM ID to yes and insert a VM ID

## Current Behavior
Use VM ID attribute and VM ID attribute are not showing up in mRemoteNG
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23084292/90646278-47237f80-e1f4-11ea-813b-d2e55c4cba42.png)


## Possible Solution
Did I miss a configuration step?

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Start mRemoteNG
2. Create a new connection
3. Look for 

## Context
It's the first time I've had a need to add a h...

iterations.description: Duplicate - Can't find Use VM ID property

comments.author: nmat
comments.snippet:
This is a feature that will come in 1.77.

See: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/316

comments.author: katsedan
comments.snippet: Hi there, can't find the feature also in 1.77

notes: Manual triage: Duplicate of VMware VM ID configuration issue. The UseVmId property exists in ConnectionInfo but requires VMware Horizon/View protocol which is not fully supported.
